main.title: Hello, my name is Oleg
main.subTitle: I am Full-Stack - web developer
main.description: I am Full-stack web developer. I am currently working as front end web developer

about.title: I'll tell you a little about myself and what I do
about.description: I started getting interested in web development and programming when I was 18 years old. Initially, I didn't know what I wanted to do in life, and decided to try my hand at development. I still think I made the right choice
about.subDescription: In my free time from work or study, I usually play games or relax with friends. I am also interested in the subject of computers, namely their components and assembly
about.skills: I'm used to learning on my own, so when learning something new, I look for information and try to figure it out myself. During my studies, I learned many interesting and useful technologies that I still use to this day

project1.name: Social Network
project1.description: My first project on React and Nest, was written in the 4th year for a graduate work

project2.name: Video hosting
project2.description: A large-scale project that is still in development (At the moment, only the server side is almost ready)

project3.name: Discord bot
project3.description: Bot for listening to music via YouTube

project4.name: E commerce
project4.description: A learning project in which I learned to use new technologies
